{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02321v1", "title": "On shallow feedforward neural networks with inputs from a topological
  space", "summary": "We study feedforward neural networks with inputs from a topological space
(TFNNs). We prove a universal approximation theorem for shallow TFNNs, which
demonstrates their capacity to approximate any continuous function defined on
this topological space. As an application, we obtain an approximative version
of Kolmogorov's superposition theorem for compact metric spaces.", "main_category": "cs.LG", "categories": "cs.LG,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-03T06:48:46Z"}
